entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 18 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023
